snippet.title: Fallacy Quiz: Sharpen Your Critical Thinking Skills - Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
🫂 Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2847380/Fallacy_Quiz/
🧑‍🔧 already in early access on itch: https://timkrief.itch.io/fallacy-quiz

📌Fallacy Quiz is an awesome quiz game about rhetorical fallacies I'm working on 😎

Sharpen your critical thinking skills in this quiz game that challenges you to spot rhetorical fallacies.
Everyone likes this game so you must too, right? 🤔 (this is a fallacy called appeal to popular opinion)

Made with love 🥰, with Godot Engine.
